description:
The real reason for the No-Name community involvement with the succession ceremony is explained by a mysterious prophecy held by Shiroyasha.  
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il paraît qu’Asuka va se faire embrasser dans l’obscurité ?
Kurayami de Hichou ga Chuuchuu Sarechau Sou Desu yo?
Someone Might Get All Kissy with Asuka in the Dark?
暗闇で飛鳥がチューチューされちゃうそうですよ?
